thread.title: Tokyo stocks close 1.11% lower
thread.title_full: Tokyo stocks close 1.11% lower | Business Spectator

author: AFP
title: Tokyo stocks close 1.11% lower
text:
Tokyo shares have closed 1.11 per cent lower as investors stayed cautious after data showed a slump in Chinese imports, reigniting worries about the pace of growth in Asia's largest economy.
The benchmark Nikkei 225 index at the Tokyo Stock Exchange on Tuesday closed 203.93 points lower at 18,234.74, as trading resumed following a long national holiday weekend.
The broader Topix index of all first-section shares dropped 0.79 per cent, or 12.00 points, to 1,503.13.
